projectGridLines.title: Determining the market fit of a category and maximizing potential
projectGridLines.description:
· Description: Identifying ways to evaluate the effectiveness of a category based on customer needs, state and occasion.

· Skill sets: 

o Business Knowledge (Marketing e-commerce or D2C industry)

o Strong familiarity with programming languages, including Python and others, is highly valued but not a prerequisite for this role

o Ability to work with query language (SQL)

o Proficiency in Excel

o Analytical Skills

o Problem Solving

o Good Communication Skills

· Expected learning:  By completing this project, you will gain a comprehensive understanding of category management in the D2C industry and identify the category levers for business growth.

· Specific courses required for project execution:  

o Database courses

o Marketing/Business Management courses

· Skill sets:

o Strong familiarity with programming languages, including Python and others, is highly valued but not a prerequisite for this role

o Ability to work with query language (SQL)

o Proficiency in Excel

o Analytical Skills

o Problem Solving

o Good Communication Skills

· Expected learning:  By completing this project, you will gain a deep understanding of the growth engine in a D2C environment, particularly in terms of customer retention.

· Specific courses required for project execution:  

o Database courses

o Marketing/Business Management courses

Marketing/Business Management courses

projectGridLines.title: Licious Infiniti
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Driving adoption and renewals for the Infiniti membership program. Infiniti membership is a strategic program to improve the stickiness of the users on the platform and hence grow the business in the long run. The project is focused on enrolling as many users in the program and retaining them as active members.

 

Expected learning: Understanding user insights about the perception and experience of a membership program, data-led decision-making, growth analysis - attributing impact for various initiatives via A/B testing techniques, user journeys - driving inferences about user behavior through the events performed by the users on the platform, business overview about the membership program

Specific courses required for project execution: Database courses and Marketing/Business Management courses

projectGridLines.title: Deep Learning-Driven Supply Chain Optimization, Incentive Structuring, and Polygon Optimization at Licious
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project intends to harness the power of deep learning algorithms to conduct a holistic analysis and optimization of the Licious supply chain. The objectives include identifying and addressing breakage points and inefficiencies in the supply chain design, optimizing service and cost through innovative incentive and penalty structures, and refining service polygon configurations to improve delivery efficiency and customer satisfaction.

·        Supply Chain Breakage Point Analysis: Use deep learning to analyze the entire supply chain, identifying bottlenecks and inefficiencies that lead to delays, increased costs, inventory problems or compromised service quality.

·        Supply Chain Design Optimization: Leverage insights from the analysis to propose and implement design improvements in the supply chain, reducing complexity and enhancing resilience.

·        Incentive and Penalty Structures: Develop incentive and penalty structures for mid and last mile delivery operations, aligning them with optimized supply chain designs to enhance service quality and cost-efficiency.

·        Polygon Optimization: Utilize deep learning algorithms to analyze delivery data, customer feedback, and geographic information, optimizing service polygons for maximum efficiency and customer satisfaction.

Skill sets: SQL, python, advanced excel

Traits expectation:  Stakeholder management, Out of the box thinking, Openness to ideas

Expected learning:  Interaction with industry leaders, Operational understanding and strategic insight, Converting data to actionable insights

projectGridLines.title: Hub Layout Optimization and Automation Integration in Licious Darkstores
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project aims to significantly enhance the efficiency and scalability of Licious darkstores through a dual approach: optimizing the physical layout of the hubs and assessing the integration of automation technologies. Given the rapid growth in demand for Licious products, the project is designed to ensure that darkstores can handle increased volumes while maintaining the quality and speed of delivery that customers expect.

·        To redesign the darkstore layout for improved operational flow, space utilization, and efficiency in order fulfillment processes.

·        To evaluate and recommend automation technologies that can be integrated into darkstore operations to increase efficiency, accuracy, and throughput.

·        To create a scalable model for darkstore operations that can adapt to growing demand and evolving market conditions.

Skill sets: SQL, python, advanced excel,

Traits: Stakeholder management, Out of the box thinking, Openness to ideas 

Learning Opportunity: Interaction with industry leaders, Operational understanding and strategic insight, Converting data to actionable insights
